newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index loses 1.24 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index loses 1.24 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index was 1.02 points, or 1.24 percent lower at 81.08 after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index provisionally fell 29.74 points to 3,520.63.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 18.85 percent from 18.81 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
